div.div:
Serial config:
- Pico: /dev/ttyS3 (UART3) @ 115200, 8N1
- ESP32: UART2 TX=GPIO13, RX=GPIO34 (external pull-up), 115200, 8N1

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
